explains: vt. 使开始运转；实施；使用于操作

sentences.en: While much work remains, trends in recent years indicate the PLA is beginning to operationalize its modern force, taking on new and more challenging missions.
sentences.cn: 尽管还有很多工作要做，但近年来的趋势表明，解放军正开始将其现代化部队投入运营，承担新的、更具挑战性的任务。

sentences.en: The analysts need to operationalize soft goals into implementable requirements.
sentences.cn: 分析人员需要将软目标转换为可实现的需求。

sentences.en: It is about how you operationalize and subsequently capitalize on market opportunity.
sentences.cn: 它是关于您如何实施并且随后利用市场机会的。
